name: Confero
tagline: Call Centre Services for Forward-Thinking Business
description:
The vision of Confero’s founders David Freedman and Daniel Sassoon was deceptively simple. They wanted to develop a mid-size 100 seat call centre model, close to major cities.Each centre would offer comprehensive and bespoke call centre solutions including inbound call handling, outbound telesales, telemarketing and sector-specific services.
As a result of this, Confero would add value to all types of businesses by giving the opportunity for real increases in sales, real increases in profitability and real increases in productivity – allowing ROI to be measured in real terms.
